name: Fancy Car Parking: Expert Driving Sim-ulator 2017
name_original: Fancy Car Parking: Expert Driving Sim-ulator 2017
description:
FANCY CAR Parking Game.
Fancy car parking is an amazing real city parking environment game for you. This game requires high precision to put your car in parking area with steering Wheel, acceleration and brake pedals. This game need to show your driving skills To protect your car from obstacles and avoid them.This game is most addictive Real physics based 3D car parking simulation game. We have to prepare as real Car parking game if you are crazy car driver.
Game Idea
Are you ready to test your driving skills and you will drive your car around Corners, obstacles in parking place with high speed accuracy.In this game there Are different cars and having different performance with each other.You can drive On various parking missions. In this game you have to prove to yourself that you Have complete all the challenging levels with great driving experience and Become a master of steering wheel.
Levels and Controls
This game has many levels and different sports realistic cars for the true fans of Extreme car parking game. Drive your car be carefully through difficulty roads in Each level when you will try to park. Control your car with steering wheel, brake, Acceleration and shift to gear forward and backward as you need. In this game There are easy and realistic smooth controls so being relax to park your car as a Stunt driver cop.
How to Play
• Select vehicle & Level
• Tap to accelerator to move forward
• Tap to brake for stop vehicle
• Tap to gear to move forward or backward
Game Features
• Real 3D environments
• Multiple levels and vehicles
• Multiple camera views
• Realistic control physics
• Realistic parking & driving experience
• Marvelous HD graphics
